content: this legal case involves two parties referred to as mb and rb and a third party swedbank liising the case is related to a joint property owned by mb and rb the tartu county court initially rejected mbs claim but a new decision was made to partially satisfy the claim and exclude obligations towards luminor bank and danske bank the court ordered the termination of joint ownership of the properties and the sale of one of them through a public auction the proceeds were to be divided equally between mb and rb the court also ordered mb and rb to fulfill their joint obligations arising from loan agreements and to pay the costs of the proceedings the court determined the value of the properties based on assessments and statistics there were also discussions about liabilities related to joint property and the fulfillment of obligations by m bachmann the court considered evidence of income expenses and the use of funds from the sale of other properties the court decided that the joint property should be sold at a public auction to ensure fairness to both parties and any thirdparty creditors the district court partially satisfied mbs appeal and ordered the parties to bear their own procedural costs
